Cherie Julianne Tan, Content Strategist at SeedlyLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 17 Aug 2018Yes, you can! There are a few things that you should look out for when opening a bank account in Singapore, usually convenience first (meaning availability of ATMs etc.) then look for high interest yielding savings account. ​Some things that the bank might require of you:Passport / Employment PassProof of Residential Address​More info here: Bank Account in Singapore for Expats: Convenience First or Interest First?0 comments2
